AdvAcctForecastDimension.name: AdvAcctForecastDimension
AdvAcctForecastDimension.description: Represents information about the dimensions selected for an advanced account forecast set.

AdvAcctForecastDimSourceId.description: The dimension source associated with the advanced account forecast set dimension record.

AdvAcctForecastSetId.description: The forecast set associated with the dimension.

DimensionFieldName.description: The API name of the field for the dimension in the custom object that contains the generated advanced account forecast records.

HierarchySequenceNumber.description: The display sequence of the dimension in the forecast data grid.
